pages.name: More information
pages.description: We need to collect a bit more information about the document you want to discontinue and where it is at in the court process. You will need a copy of the document and some information about your case. If donâ€™t know the answer, contact the court registry where your case is filed.

elements.name: Form3FiledDate
elements.title: When was the application filed?
elements.description: Look for a registry stamp on the document. The date the document is filed will be there.

elements.name: ExplanationInvalidForm3FiledDate
elements.title: The application date cannot be in the future.

elements.name: ReplyType
elements.title: What type of application is your document in reply to?

choices.text: Application About a Family Law Matter (Form 3)
Counter Application About a Family Law Matter (Form 6)

elements.name: ReplyFiledDate
elements.title: When was the reply filed?
elements.description: Look for a registry stamp on the document. The date the document is filed will be there.

elements.name: ExplanationInvalidReplyFiledDate
elements.title: The reply date cannot be in the future.

elements.name: CounterFiledDate
elements.title: When was the counter application filed?
elements.description: Look for a registry stamp on the document. The date the document is filed will be there.

elements.name: ExplanationInvalidCounterFiledDate
elements.title: The counter application date cannot be in the future.

elements.name: CourtAppearanceScheduled
elements.title: Do you have a court appearance scheduled for this document?
elements.description:
Select Yes only if you have a scheduled court appearance in the future, not if it already happened. The registry will use this information to make sure it is cancelled or properly scheduled if the appearance is still needed.

Note: When you file a Notice of Discontinuance, the court appearance only for your application will be cancelled. If the other party also has an application scheduled for the same appearance, you must attend for their application, unless it is also discontinued.

elements.name: CourtAppearanceDate
elements.title: What date is the scheduled court appearance?
elements.description: If there is more than one scheduled court appearance for your document, give the date of the soonest appearance.

elements.name: ExplanationInvalidCourtAppearanceDate
elements.title: The court appearance date cannot be in the past.

elements.name: TrialPrep
elements.title: Has a trial preparation conference already happened?
elements.description: A trial preparation conference is a court appearance with a judge to talk about and plan for your trial. The notice for the appearance usually tells you what type of appearance it is. For example, Notice of Trial Preparation Conference.

elements.name: TrialDateScheduled
elements.title: Is a trial date scheduled within 30 days of the date you can file this notice of discontinuance?

pages.title: More information
